short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mouse üzerine geldiğinde fotoğraf kontrolü yapar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the mouse cursor hovers over this particular element, a popup window is triggered, providing users with the option to open their desired image in a new browser tab. This interactive feature enhances user experience by enabling seamless navigation and accessibility to specific content. By simply hovering over the designated area, users can conveniently explore and access the images they desire, thereby optimizing usability and convenience within the browsing experience.
